imdb.plot outline: Based on Fu Xings own novel, also directed by the author, Zombie Sifu tells you a story about the most viscous Kung fu master in the ancient Dynasty until his own students has enough and defeat him in mortal combat. But what they didn't know is he sold his soul to the most brutal gods, in return he would become an immortal, he is now a zombie and on his hunt for those who defeated him.
imdb.title: Zombie Sifu
plot: What can you do when the most evil Kung fu master has become an undead?::Youku

Based on Fu Xings own novel, also directed by the author, _Zombie Sifu_ (qv) tells you a story about the most viscous Kung fu master in the ancient Dynasty until his own students has enough and defeat him in mortal combat. But what they didn't know is he sold his soul to the most brutal gods, in return he would become an immortal, he is now a zombie and on his hunt for those who defeated him.::Youku
